sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 每个人都有自己的梦想。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Měi gè rén dōu yǒu zìjǐ de mèngxiǎng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Chacun a ses propres rêves.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Everyone has their own dreams.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè tiáo xiàngliàn shì chúnyín de.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce collier est en argent pur.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This necklace is made of pure silver.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā bùduàn nǔlì tígāo zìjǐ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il s'efforce continuellement de s'améliorer.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He constantly strives to improve himself.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 你不必担心，我会处理的。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nǐ bùbì dānxīn, wǒ huì chǔlǐ de.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Tu n'as pas besoin de t'inquiéter, je m'en occupe.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: You don't need to worry, I'll handle it.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 经常锻炼对身体有好处。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Jīngcháng duànliàn duì shēntǐ yǒu hǎochù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Faire régulièrement de l'exercice est bon pour la santé.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Regular exercise is good for your health.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì yī gè kùnnan de xuǎnzé.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est un choix difficile.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is a difficult choice.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Háizimen wéizhe lǎoshī zuò.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les enfants sont assis autour du professeur.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The children sit around the teacher.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ měi gè yuè dōu cún yīxiē qián.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'économise de l'argent chaque mois.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I save some money every month.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这个房间的面积是二十平方米。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège fángjiān de miànjī shì èrshí píngfāng mǐ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La superficie de cette pièce est de vingt mètres carrés.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The area of this room is twenty square meters.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我喜欢听这个电台的节目。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ xǐhuan tīng zhège diàntái de jiémù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'aime écouter les émissions de cette station de radio.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I like listening to this radio station's programs.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tuánjié jiùshì lìliàng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'union fait la force.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Unity is strength.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我们需要进一步研究这个问题。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen xūyào jìnyībù yánjiū zhège wèntí.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous devons approfondir l'étude de ce problème.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We need to further study this issue.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Lǚkèmen zhèngzài qiánwǎng jīchǎng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les passagers se dirigent vers l'aéroport.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The passengers are heading to the airport.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这个计划已经被批准了。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège jìhuà yǐjīng bèi pīzhǔn le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce plan a été approuvé.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This plan has been approved.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Mǒu rén zài ménkǒu děng nǐ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Quelqu'un t'attend à la porte.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Someone is waiting for you at the door.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè dào tí hěn jiǎndān.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette question est très simple.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This question is very simple.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 很多志愿者参加了这次活动。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Hěn duō zhìyuànzhě cānjiā le zhè cì huódòng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: De nombreux bénévoles ont participé à cette activité.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Many volunteers participated in this activity.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Bùyào bǎ shū yā zài zhǐ shàng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ne pose pas le livre sur le papier.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Don't press the book on the paper.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì yī zuò gǔlǎo de chéngshì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est une ville ancienne.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is an ancient city.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Suīrán hěn lèi, dàn wǒ hěn kāixīn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Bien que je sois fatigué, je suis très content.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Although I'm tired, I'm very happy.
